bibl.title: The king, the palace, the circus, and a notary. A new late antique literary papyrus
bibl.seg: Aikaterini Koroli & Amphilochios Papathomas, The King, the Palace, the Circus, and a Notary. A New Late Antique Literary Papyrus.
bibl.note: Hermopolite nome?, 5th or 6th cent. "Either a low-quality copy of an unknown literary work or a clumsy autograph of a local author, full of misspellings".
bibl.seg: Hermopolite nome?, 5th or 6th cent. "Either a low-quality copy of an unknown literary work or a clumsy autograph of a local author, full of misspellings".
